Admiral.Title: William Ross
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1-2 that is in your forward firing arc. If the target ship attacks this round, that ship rolls 1 less attack die this round.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship within Range 1-2 that is in your forward firing arc. If the target ship attacks this round, that ship rolls 1 less attack die this round.

Admiral.Title: Velal
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice. If you do so, add 1 [EVADE] result to your roll.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Each time you defend this round, during the Roll Defense Dice step, you may choose to roll 2 less defense dice. If you do so, add 1 [EVADE] result to your roll.

Admiral.Title: Shanthi
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. When attacking that ship this round, you may re-roll all of your blank results once. In addition, if the target ship is Cloaked, immediately flip that ship's [CLOAK] Token over to its red side.
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: Target a ship at Range 1-2. When attacking that ship this round, you may re-roll all of your blank results once. In addition, if the target ship is Cloaked, immediately flip that ship's [CLOAK] Token over to its red side.

Admiral.Title: Hayes
Admiral.Ability: ACTION: All friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship gain +1 attack die this round (+2 attack dice against Borg ships).
Admiral.AdmiralAbility: FLEET ACTION: All friendly ships within Range 1 of your ship gain +1 attack die this round (+2 attack dice against Borg ships).
